website_summaries.verdict: Famous model of fairway wood that will give you a good performance at a reasonable price point.
pros: Trusted brand name and model that many golfers love to use
Available in many different club face lofts and shaft materials so you can find the best model for your needs
Offers an aerodynamically designed club head shape to generate as much club speed as possible
cons: A little less distance than some others

customer_reviews.title: I, ve been able to hit this farther than ...
customer_reviews.text: I,ve been able to hit this farther than some drives but with more loft.
customer_reviews.author: LIVIN' THE DREAM

customer_reviews.title: Great club. Recommend the HL clubs for the average ...
customer_reviews.text: Great club. Recommend the HL clubs for the average player.
customer_reviews.author: JDB

customer_reviews.title: Very nice club. Excellent feel and flex
customer_reviews.text: Very nice club. Excellent feel and flex. This club is light weight and I find myself no longer over gripping just to get the club head thru the ball for a decent shot.
customer_reviews.author: Norbert R

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this club ..... it even cuts through the rough .. awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Annapics

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent club. Much easier to hit than a 5 iron.
customer_reviews.author: George L.

customer_reviews.title: Taylor-made has another winner
customer_reviews.text: Club is as advertised. Good contact from the fairway and off the tee.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have the right club in the bag for this distance with loft. Problem solved
customer_reviews.author: john kotowski

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good value, have not used it a lot, but nice feel and good distance.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Nugent

customer_reviews.title: Gives you a fighting chance
customer_reviews.text: Perfect 3 wood. If your game is a little lax, you need this club for the long par 5. And Par 3 tee-off. excellent loft, great distance club. Very forgiving.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I received a 3 wood with a medium flex. ...
customer_reviews.text: I received a 3 wood with a medium flex. I ordered a 3 wood with a Senior flex. Not sure what to do yet ??
customer_reviews.author: Richard Sammons

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item was as described and received as promised and on time.
customer_reviews.author: Leroy E.

product_meta.title: TaylorMade Men's AeroBurner Fairway Wood
feature_bullets: New aerodynamic shape with a shallow face raised center crown and new hosel fin
New Speed Pocket increases the size of the sweet spot and reduces spin
Uses highest strength face material Ni CO 300 Super alloy built with new Matrix Speed RUL Z 60 Shaft and TM Speed grip
New matte white finish black PVD face and linear AeroBurner crown graphic make alignment easy
